description: Grafana Dashboard for Synology Devices, collecting SNMP using Telegraf, and InfluxDB

panels.description: This panel displays all the needed Synology information of the unit you are running.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "synoSystem.modelName")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> distinct(column: "_value")
  |> group() 
  |> last() 
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "synoSystem.version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> distinct(column: "_value")
  |> group() 
  |> last() 
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory.memTotalReal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> group() 
  |> last() 
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> group() 
  |> last() 
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["diskID"])
  |> distinct(column: "diskID")
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.network")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifDescrEX"])
  |> distinct(column: "ifDescrEX")
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hrSystem.hrSystemUptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 360000}))
  |> group() 
  |> last() 
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Synology Overview - $synologyhostname

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "synoSystem.cpuFanStatus")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "synoSystem.systemFanStatus")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "synoSystem.temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskTemperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.services")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "serviceUsers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskModel" or r["_field"] == "diskStatus" or r["_field"] == "diskType" or r["_field"] == "diskTemperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()

numCpus = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "host", "agent_host", "systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus"])

stats = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "systemStats.ssCpuRawSystem" or r["_field"] == "systemStats.ssCpuRawUser" or r["_field"] == "systemStats.ssCpuRawWait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "host", "agent_host", "systemStats.ssCpuRawSystem", "systemStats.ssCpuRawUser", "systemStats.ssCpuRawWait"])

join(
    tables: { numCpus: numCpus, stats: stats },
    on: ["_time", "_start", "_stop"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    "systemStats.ssCpuRawSystem": r["systemStats.ssCpuRawSystem"] / float(v: r["systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus"]),
    "systemStats.ssCpuRawUser": r["systemStats.ssCpuRawUser"] / float(v: r["systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus"]),
    "systemStats.ssCpuRawWait": r["systemStats.ssCpuRawWait"] / float(v: r["systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus"]),
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["systemStats.ssCpuNumCpus"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory.memTotalReal" or r["_field"] == "memory.memAvailReal" or r["_field"] == "memory.memBuffer" or r["_field"] == "memory.memCached")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      r with 
      _value: 100.0 - ((float(v: r["memory.memAvailReal"]) + float(v: r["memory.memBuffer"]) + float(v: r["memory.memCached"])) / float(v: r["memory.memTotalReal"]) * 100.0) 
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["source", "_field", "agent_host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.network")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifHCOutOctets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["ifName","agent_host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.network")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifHCInOctets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["ifName","agent_host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "nonnegative derivative")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskTemperature")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "_time": r["_time"], "_field": "CPU", "_value": r["_value"] }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskTemperature")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ "_time": r["_time"], "_field": r["diskID"], "_value": r["_value"] }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.volume")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hrStorageUsed" or r["_field"] == "hrStorageSize")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hrStorageDescr"] =~ /^\/volume\d+/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r.hrStorageUsed) / float(v: r.hrStorageSize) * 100.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["hrStorageSize", "hrStorageUsed"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.storageIO")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storageIOReads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.storageIO")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storageIOWrites")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.storageIO")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storageIONReadX")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology.storageIO")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storageIONWrittenX")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${synologyhostname:regex}/)
  |> derivative()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["agent_host"])
  |> distinct(column: "agent_host")
  |> group()
list.label: Hostname
list.name: synologyhostname

query.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.Synology")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["agent_host"])
  |> distinct(column: "agent_host")
  |> group()

title: Synology Dashboard
